title: Back for the New Year
description:
The gang is back for the new year and they dive into stories about Patton Oswalt & Dave Chappelle, and a... possibly tipsy, Andy Cohen.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
